TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PackageDigitalSignatureManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供公用程式類別，可用來建立及驗證 中的數位簽章。

span.span: Provides a utility class for the creation and verification of digital signatures in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 數位簽章類別，並提供公用程式類別來執行一般工作中使用的數位簽章的.NET framework 架構是根據項目。 builds on the architecture of .NET Framework digital signature classes and provides a utility class for performing common tasks in using digital signatures with elements. 如需有關封裝的數位簽章的詳細資訊，請參閱[Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494)文章。For more information about package digital signatures, see the [Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494) article. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用。The following example shows how to use the . 如需完整的範例，請參閱[建立封裝的數位簽章範例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159966)。For the complete sample, see [Creating a Package with a Digital Signature Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159966).

related.span: 建立封裝的數位簽章的範例

span.span: Creating a Package with a Digital Signature Sample

related.span: 開放式封裝慣例 (OPC) 規格

span.span: Open Packaging Conventions (OPC) Specification

related.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

span.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IO.Packaging.Package package) cil managed

param.name: package
param.span: 這個簽章管理員所關聯的封裝。

span.span: The package associated with this signature manager.

summary.span: 將 類別的新執行個體初始化，以搭配指定 使用。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for use with a specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在初始化期間，會設定簽章管理員相關聯的目標套件。The target package associated with the signature manager is set during initialization. 設定之後，就無法變更與簽章管理員相關聯的套件。After it is set, the package associated with the signature manager cannot be changed. 視需要建立新的簽章的每個套件管理員。Create a new signature manager for each package as needed. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用這個建構函式。The following example shows how to use this constructor. 如需完整的範例，請參閱[建立封裝的數位簽章範例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159966)。For the complete sample, see [Creating a Package with a Digital Signature Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159966).

related.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

span.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IO::Packaging::CertificateEmbeddingOption CertificateOption { System::IO::Packaging::CertificateEmbeddingOption get(); void set(System::IO::Packaging::CertificateEmbeddingOption value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定 方法用來對封包組件進行數位簽署的 X.509 憑證內嵌選項。

span.span: Gets or sets the X.509 certificate embedding option used by the method to digitally sign package parts.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會指定以數位方式簽署組件時，儲存簽署者的 X.509 憑證。This property specifies where the signer's X.509 certificate will be stored when digitally signing a part. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定此屬性在以數位方式簽署的組件在封裝內的準備。The following example shows how to set this property in preparation to digitally sign the parts within a package. 如需完整的範例，請參閱[建立封裝的數位簽章範例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159966)。For the complete sample, see [Creating a Package with a Digital Signature Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159966).

related.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

span.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

summary.span: 使用指定的 X.509 憑證來副署封裝中的簽章。

span.span: Countersigns signatures in the package with a specified X.509 certificate.

related.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

span.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature Countersign() cil managed

summary.span: 使用使用者選取的 X.509 憑證，來副署封裝中的所有簽章。

span.span: Countersigns all the signatures in the package with a user-selected X.509 certificate.

returns.span: 加入為副署的簽章；或者，如果找不到憑證，或使用者已取消憑證選取對話方塊，則為 。

span.span: The signature that was added as a countersign; or if no certificate could be located or the user canceled the certificate selection dialog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在呼叫中不指定任何 X.509 憑證，則這個方法會開啟憑證選取對話方塊，提示使用者選擇要用於簽署的憑證。If no X.509 certificate is specified in the call, this method opens a certificate selection dialog box that prompts the user to choose a certificate to use for signing. 設定視窗控制代碼屬性，然後再呼叫進行特定視窗強制回應的憑證選取對話方塊。Set the window handle in the property before calling to make the Certificate Selection Dialog modal to the given window.

summary.span: 取得 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] 字串，此字串可識別用來建立及驗證簽章的預設雜湊演算法。

span.span: Gets a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] string that identifies the default hash algorithm used to create and verify signatures.

value.span: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] 字串，識別用來建立及驗證簽章的預設雜湊演算法。

span.span: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] string that identifies the default hash algorithm used to create and verify signatures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標準的預設雜湊演算法類別是([!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_sha1](~/includes/tlasharptla-sha1-md.md)])。The default hash algorithm for the standard class is ([!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_sha1](~/includes/tlasharptla-sha1-md.md)]). 屬性會取得或設定實際的雜湊演算法，這用來建立及驗證簽章。The property gets or sets the actual hash algorithm this is used to create and verify signatures. 屬性通常用來重設設回暫存的變更後的預設值的屬性。The property is typically used to reset the property back to default after a temporary change.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定 執行個體的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] 識別項，以用來建立及驗證簽章。

span.span: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] identifier for the instance used to create and verify signatures.

value.span: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]識別碼用來建立及驗證簽章的執行個體。

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] identifier for the instance used to create and verify signatures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標準的數位簽章管理員的預設雜湊演算法識別項是( -安全雜湊演算法 1.0 版)。The default hash algorithm identifier for the standard digital signature manager is ( - Secure Hash Algorithm version 1.0). 除非明確設定，否則為此屬性取得相同的值，否則。Unless explicitly set otherwise, this property gets the same value as . 屬性通常不會變更其預設值。The property is typically not changed from its default. 必須變更此屬性，才會使用不同的已知的簽章和存取為止。This property must be changed only if a signature that uses a different known and accessible is encountered. 完成時，會使用不同的雜湊演算法的簽章，呼叫重設設回預設值的屬性。When finished with the signature that uses a different hash algorithm, call to reset the property back to default.

span.span: The string for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] to set is .

exception.span: 要設定的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] 字串是空的。

span.span: The string for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] to set is empty.

summary.span: 發生於 遇到無效簽章時。

span.span: Occurs when encounters an invalid signature.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSigned As Boolean
public: property bool IsSigned { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得數值，指出封裝是否含有任何簽章。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the package contains any signatures.

value.span: 如果封裝含有簽章，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the package contains signatures; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性不會執行簽章驗證。The property does not perform signature validations. 如果簽章有並是`true`，一或多個簽章可能無效。If signatures are present and is `true`, one or more of the signatures might not be valid. 呼叫確認簽章有效，且未變更。Call to confirm that the signatures are valid and have not changed. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷封裝是否包含數位簽章。The following example shows how to use the property to determine if a package contains digital signatures. 如需完整的範例，請參閱[建立封裝的數位簽章範例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159966)。For the complete sample, see [Creating a Package with a Digital Signature Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159966). summary.span: 取得或設定控制代碼，控制用來顯示憑證選取對話方塊的父視窗。

span.span: Gets or sets a handle to the parent window for displaying a certificate selection dialog box.

value.span: 父視窗的控制代碼，用來顯示憑證選取對話方塊。

span.span: The handle of the parent window to use to display the certificate selection dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 才會出現的憑證選取對話方塊呼叫中包含任何憑證。A certificate selection dialog box is presented only if a call contains no certificates. 如果未不指定任何憑證，會顯示憑證選取對話方塊，可讓使用者選擇要用於簽署的憑證。If no certificates are specified, will display a certificate selection dialog box that enables the user to choose which certificate to use for signing.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveAllSignatures() cil managed

summary.span: 從封裝中移除所有數位簽章。

span.span: Removes all digital signatures from the package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法也會從封裝移除所有的 X.509 憑證。This method also removes all X.509 certificates from the package. 移除所有的簽章和憑證之後, 呼叫保存至存放區的所有變更。After removing all signatures and certificates, call to persist all changes to the store.

related.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

span.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

param.name: signatureUri
param.span: 要移除之 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] 的 。

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the to remove.

summary.span: 移除具有指定簽章 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] 的數位簽章。

span.span: Removes the digital signature with a given signature [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果它未參考的任何其他數位簽章，這個方法也會移除相關聯的 X.509 憑證。This method also removes the associated X.509 certificate if it is not referenced by any other digital signature. 移除簽章之後, 呼叫保存至存放區的變更。After removing a signature, call to persist the change to the store.

Public Function Sign (parts As IEnumerable(Of Uri), certificate As X509Certificate, relationshipSelectors As IEnumerable(Of PackageRelationshipSelector)) As PackageDigitalSignature

param.name: parts
param.span: 要簽署之 物件的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] 清單。

span.span: The list of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] for the objects to sign.

param.name: certificate
param.span: 用來對每個指定之組件和關聯性進行數位簽署的 X.509 憑證。

span.span: The X.509 certificate to use to digitally sign each of the specified parts and relationships.

param.name: relationshipSelectors
param.span: 要簽署的 物件清單。

span.span: The list of objects to sign.

param.name: parts

remarks.format: ## Remarks `parts`清單可以是空白或`null`如果`relationshipSelectors`包含至少一個項目。The `parts` list can be empty or `null` if `relationshipSelectors` contains at least one entry. `relationshipSelectors`清單可以是空白或`null`如果`parts`包含至少一個項目。The `relationshipSelectors` list can be empty or `null` if `parts` contains at least one entry. 之間`parts` 清單和`relationshipSelectors`但必須至少一個登入的項目。Between the `parts` list and `relationshipSelectors` there must be at least one element to sign. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何數位簽署的封裝組件清單。The following example shows how to digitally sign a list of package parts. 如需完整的範例，請參閱[建立封裝的數位簽章範例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159966)。For the complete sample, see the [Creating a Package with a Digital Signature Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159966). MemberSignature.Value: public System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature Sign (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Uri> parts, System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate certificate, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector> relationshipSelectors, string signatureId, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject> signatureObjects, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference> objectReferences);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature Sign(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Uri> parts, class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate certificate, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector> relationshipSelectors, string signatureId, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject> signatureObjects, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference> objectReferences) cil managed

Public Function Sign (parts As IEnumerable(Of Uri), certificate As X509Certificate, relationshipSelectors As IEnumerable(Of PackageRelationshipSelector), signatureId As String, signatureObjects As IEnumerable(Of DataObject), objectReferences As IEnumerable(Of Reference)) As PackageDigitalSignature

public: System::IO::Packaging::PackageDigitalSignature ^ Sign(System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<Uri ^> ^ parts, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate ^ certificate, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::IO::Packaging::PackageRelationshipSelector ^> ^ relationshipSelectors, System::String ^ signatureId, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::Security::Cryptography::Xml::DataObject ^> ^ signatureObjects, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::Security::Cryptography::Xml::Reference ^> ^ objectReferences);

MemberSignature.Usage: packageDigitalSignatureManager.Sign (parts, certificate, relationshipSelectors, signatureId, signatureObjects, objectReferences)

param.name: parts
param.span: 要簽署之 物件的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] 清單。

span.span: The list of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] for the objects to sign.

param.name: certificate
param.span: 用來對每個指定之組件和關聯性進行數位簽署的 X.509 憑證。

span.span: The X.509 certificate to use to digitally sign each of the specified parts and relationships.

param.name: relationshipSelectors
param.span: 要簽署的 物件清單。

span.span: The list of objects to sign.

param.name: signatureId
param.span: 要與簽章相關聯的識別字串。

span.span: An identification string to associate with the signature.

param.name: signatureObjects
param.span: 要簽署的自訂資料物件清單。

span.span: A list of custom data objects to sign.

param.name: objectReferences
param.span: 要簽署的自訂物件參考清單。

span.span: A list of references to custom objects to sign.

summary.span: 以指定的 X.509 憑證和簽章 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)]，簽署套件組件、套件關聯性或自訂物件清單。

span.span: Signs a list of package parts, package relationships, or custom objects with a specified X.509 certificate and signature [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)].

returns.span: 用來簽署 和 清單中所指定之項目的數位簽章。

span.span: The digital signature used to sign the elements specified in the and lists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必須有至少一個項目，來登入`parts`， `relationshipSelectors`， `signatureObjects`，或`objectReferences`。There must be at least one element to sign in `parts`, `relationshipSelectors`, `signatureObjects`, or `objectReferences`. > [!NOTE] > 條款`Object`， `Manifest`， `Reference`， `SignatureProperties`，並`Transform`兩個註解下列參考的項目類型和 W3C XML 簽章語法和處理規格所定義的標記，請參閱[ https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/).The terms `Object`, `Manifest`, `Reference`, `SignatureProperties`, and `Transform` in the following two remarks refer to element types and tags defined by the W3C XML-Signature Syntax and Processing specification, see [https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/). 本文及其他方法多載會使用目前定義的字典`Transform`將根據 封裝組件。This and other method overloads use the current dictionary that defines a `Transform` to apply based on the package part . Microsoft 開放封裝慣例 (OPC) 規格目前允許只有兩個有效`Transform`演算法：C14 和 C14N。The Microsoft Open Packaging Conventions (OPC) specification currently allows only two valid `Transform` algorithms: C14 and C14N. W3C XML 簽章語法和處理標準不允許空白`Manifest`標記。The W3C XML-Signature Syntax and Processing standard does not allow empty `Manifest` tags. 開放封裝慣例規格也需要-特定`Object`同時包含的標記`Manifest`和`SignatureProperties`標記。Also the Open Packaging Conventions specification requires a -specific `Object` tag that contains both `Manifest` and `SignatureProperties` tags. 每個`Manifest`標記此外也包含至少一個`Reference`標記。Each `Manifest` tag additionally also include at least one `Reference` tag. 這些標記可讓您要求每個簽章簽署至少一個（非空白組件標記） 或(非空白`relationshipSelectors`) 即使簽章只為了簽署`signatureObjects`或`objectReferences`。These tags require that each signature sign at least one (non-empty parts tag) or (non-empty `relationshipSelectors`) even if the signature is needed only to sign `signatureObjects` or `objectReferences`. 這方法會忽略每個相關聯的屬性中定義`objectReferences`。This method ignores the property associated with each defined in `objectReferences`. 這多載可讓您產生[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]需要自訂的簽章`Object`標記。This overload provides support for generation of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] signatures that require custom `Object` tags. 提供任何`Object`標記來簽署，相對應`Reference`標記必須隨附[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]，指定`Object`本機片段語法中的標記。For any provided `Object` tag to be signed, a corresponding `Reference` tag must be provided with a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] that specifies the `Object` tag in local fragment syntax. 比方說如果`Object`標記的識別碼為"myObject"，在 URI`Reference`標記會是"#myObject 」。For example if the `Object` tag has an ID of "myObject", the URI in the `Reference` tag would be "#myObject". 為不帶正負號的物件，不`Reference`需要。For unsigned objects, no `Reference` is required.

exception.span: 、、 和 都未指定要簽署的任何項目。

span.span: Neither , , , nor specify any elements to sign.

exception.span: 所簽署組件的 參考空白、 或未定義的 。

span.span: A of a part being signed references an empty, , or undefined .

exception.span: 不是 ，而且不是有效的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] 結構描述識別碼 (例如，開頭為前置數字)。

span.span: is not and is not a valid [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] schema ID (for example, begins with a leading numeric digit).

related.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

span.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

public: property Uri ^ SignatureOrigin { Uri ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得簽章原點組件的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。

span.span: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the signature origin part.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the signature origin part.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]可能會因封裝因為未正式定義的名稱。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] can vary by package because the name is not formally defined. 雖然這個實作通常會使用相同的預設值，這個屬性所傳回的值將會反映任何來源中已經有目前。While this implementation will generally use the same default value, the value returned by this property will reflect whatever origin is already present in the current .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TimeFormat { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.TimeFormat : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定用來建立簽章 的日期與時間格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the date/time format used to create a signature .

value.span: 用來建立簽章 的日期與時間格式。

span.span: The date/time format used to create a signature .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值是"YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD"。The default is "YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD". 日期/時間格式會遵循的語法[W3C 日期和時間格式的規格](https://www.w3.org/TR/Note-datetime.html)。Date/time formats follow the syntax of the [W3C Date and Time Formats specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/Note-datetime.html). 如下所示的元件必須存在，並使用的語法和標點符號所定義。The components shown below must be present and use the syntax and punctuation as defined. |TimeFormatTimeFormat|描述Description|範例Example| |----------------|-----------------|-------------| |YYYYYYYY|YearYear|20052005| |YYYY-MMYYYY-MM|年份和月份Year and month|2005-072005-07| |YYYY-MM-DDYYYY-MM-DD|完成日期Complete date|2005-07-282005-07-28| |YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZDYYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD|完成日期加上小時和分鐘Complete date plus hours and minutes|2005-07-28T19:20-01:002005-07-28T19:20-01:00| |YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZDYYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD|完成日期加上小時、 分鐘和秒數Complete date plus hours, minutes, and seconds|2005-07-28T19:20:45-01:002005-07-28T19:20:45-01:00| |YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZDYYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD|完成日期加上小時、 分鐘和秒與小數Complete date plus hours, minutes, and seconds with a decimal fraction|2005-07-28T19:20:45.75-01:002005-07-28T19:20:45.75-01:00| 其中：where: ||| |-|-| |YYYYYYYY|四位數年份 (例如，2005)four-digit year (for example 2005)| |MMMM|兩位數月份 (01 = 年 1 月)two-digit month (01=January)| |DDDD|兩位數天數的月份 (01 到 31)two-digit day of month (01 through 31)| |ThhThh|兩位數小時 (從 00 到 23、 24 小時的時間)two-digit hour (00 through 23, 24-hour time)| |mmmm|兩個位數的分鐘數 (從 00 到 59)two digits of minutes (00 through 59)| |ssss|兩個位數的秒數 (從 00 到 59)two digits of seconds (00 through 59)| |秒s|一或多個代表第二個中的小數點後幾位的數字one or more digits representing a decimal fracion of a second| |TZDTZD|時區指示項 (Z 或 + hh: mm 或-hh: mm)time zone designator (Z or +hh:mm or -hh:mm)|

related.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

span.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

summary.span: 取得包含各個已定義 和其相關聯 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] . 識別碼的字典

identifier.

identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 簽署作業期間每個內容類型的相關聯的轉換演算法會套用之前執行。During a sign operation the associated transform algorithm for each content type is applied before the is executed. 預設的內容和轉換的對應包括：Default content and transform mappings include: |內容Content|ContentTypeContentType|轉換演算法識別項Transform algorithm identifier| |-------------|-----------------|------------------------------------| |RelationshipRelationship|"application/vnd.openxmlformats-package.relationships+xml""application/vnd.openxmlformats-package.relationships+xml"|| |數位簽章Digital Signature|"application/vnd.openxmlformats-package.digital-signature-xmlsignature+xml""application/vnd.openxmlformats-package.digital-signature-xmlsignature+xml"||

span.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainStatusFlags VerifyCertificate(class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate certificate) cil managed
Public Shared Function VerifyCertificate (certificate As X509Certificate) As X509ChainStatusFlags

param.name: certificate
param.span: 要驗證的 X.509 憑證。

span.span: The X.509 certificate to verify.

summary.span: 驗證指定的 X.509 憑證。

span.span: Verifies a given X.509 certificate.

returns.span: 如果成功驗證憑證，則為 (值 0)；否則為錯誤旗標的位元列舉。

span.span: (value 0) if the certificate verified successfully; otherwise, a bitwise enumeration of error flags.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult VerifySignatures(bool exitOnFailure) cil managed
Public Function VerifySignatures (exitOnFailure As Boolean) As VerifyResult

param.name: exitOnFailure
param.span: 表示在第一次失敗時結束；否則， 表示繼續並檢查所有簽章。

span.span: to exit on first failure; otherwise, to continue and check all signatures.

summary.span: 確認封裝內所有已簽署組件上的簽章。

span.span: Verifies the signatures on all signed parts within the package.

returns.span: 如果已順利驗證所有簽章，則為 (值 0)；否則為識別錯誤的列舉。

span.span: (value 0) if all signatures are verified successfully; otherwise, an enumeration that identifies the error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會驗證只有數位簽章;它不會驗證相關的 X.509 憑證。This method verifies only the digital signatures; it does not verify the related X.509 certificates. 方法可用來驗證 X.509 憑證。The method can be used to verify the X.509 certificates. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用此方法來驗證套件內所有已簽署的組件。The following example shows how to use this method to validate all signed parts within a package. 如需完整的範例，請參閱[建立封裝的數位簽章範例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159966)。For the complete sample, see [Creating a Package with a Digital Signature Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159966). [!code-csharp[PackageDigitalSignature#PackageDigSigValidate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PackageDigitalSignature/CSharp/PackageDigitalSignature.cs#packagedigsigvalidate)] [!code-vb[PackageDigitalSignature#PackageDigSigValidate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PackageDigitalSignature/visualbasic/packagedigitalsignature.vb#packagedigsigvalidate)]

related.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

span.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions
